page.title: 16MALSIS SCHOOL
page.content: Founded in 1940,Malsis Preparatory School stands in 40 acres of ground adjacent to the Colne-Keighley road. It takes boys aged from 7 to 13.Boys are admitted following an interview and a brief trial period in the school. At present there are 186 pupils. There are 19 dormitories,4 sick rooms, a surgery,5 day rooms,18 teaching rooms and other facilities such as pool,gymnasium and theatre/hall. There are 18 full time teaching staff and 12 part time staff,6 matrons and 32 ancillary staff and 5 groundsmen. The school prepares pupils for Common entrance examinations or Scholarship to Senior Independent Schools as well as 13+ entrance to Grammar Schools. A Geography Centre was added to the school in 1985 and a Music Block is presently under construction.
